text: I have 6 different communities set up with their own HubDB that contains events. I am looking to create a feed that pulls all the table data from the 6 different tables into 1. is this possible?
you can have it all display in the same place yes using HubL. feeding multiple hubdbs into one hubdb is unnecessary. If you did want to feed them into one table, youâ€™ll have to use the API.
how would you then write the query. that pulls all the data from 6 tables? using API is not an option
You make 6 separate queries filtering as needed then you add them together in a combined variable, printing rows as necessary
